projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.description: Personal portfolio website built with React, Tailwind CSS, and deployed on Vercel.
projects.longDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience. Built with React and Tailwind CSS for a sleek design and fast performance.

projects.title: Kids Learning App
projects.description: Interactive mobile app for children with lessons, quizzes, and animations using Flutter and Firebase.
projects.longDescription: An educational mobile application designed for children to learn through interactive lessons, engaging quizzes, and fun animations. Features include progress tracking, parental controls, and cloud synchronization.

projects.title: Khan Traders
projects.description: Modern web application built with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, deployed on Vercel.
projects.longDescription: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React and Next.js, featuring server-side rendering, responsive design, and seamless user experience. Deployed on Vercel for optimal performance.
